ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer, cold
3 tablespoons sugar-free chocolate flavoring syrup (such as ToraniÂ®)
3 tablespoons sugar-free caramel flavoring syrup (such as ToraniÂ®)
1 teaspoon artificial sweetener, or to taste
des: "A low-calorie frappe that whips up to a nice creamy consistency thanks to the carbonation in the root beer."
ins:
Pour root beer into an ice cube tray, adding water to fill the tray as needed.
Freeze until solid, 2 to 3 hours.
Combine frozen root beer, milk, chocolate syrup, caramel syrup, instant coffee, vanilla extract, and sweetener in a blender; blend until smooth.
